text.title: Text
examples: Hello, can you count giraffes in Africa?
What do you know about penguins?
What can you say about material science top research fields?

total.title: Total
total.description: Total count of available records. It can be larger than results count.

included_document_ids.title: Included Document Ids
included_document_ids.description: Subset of document identifiers used for information retrieval

total.title: Total
total.description: Total count of available records. It can be larger than results count.

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: ID of the document this chunk belongs to

chunk_index.title: Chunk Index
chunk_index.description: Index of the chunk in the document

document_chunk_index.title: Document Chunk Index
document_chunk_index.description: Chunk index in the document part

embedding_key.title: Embedding Key
embedding_key.description: Text content of the chunk which will be used for embedding

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: Maximum number of chunks to retrieve

included_document_ids.title: Included Document Ids
included_document_ids.description: List of document IDs to include in the search

total.title: Total
total.description: Total count of available records. It can be larger than results count.

chunk_index.title: Chunk Index
chunk_index.description: Index of the chunk in the document

similarity_score.title: Similarity Score
similarity_score.description: Similarity score between the query and chunk

content.title: Content
content.description: The content of the current chunk.

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the message sender, typically 'assistant'.

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the message sender, typically 'assistant'.

tool_calls.title: Tool Calls
tool_calls.description: This field is currently always None, but may be changed later.

code.title: Code
code.description: The error code indicating the type of error.

message.title: Message
message.description: A detailed message describing the error.

role.description: The origin type of the message.

name.title: Name
name.description: An optional name for the message.
examples: Question about the unlimited possibilities of AI

model.title: Model
model.description: Alias of the LLM to be used in the chat session.

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: List of messages representing the chat history.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

max_completion_tokens.title: Max Completion Tokens
max_completion_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens that can be generated in the completion.

top_p.title: Top P
top_p.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

frequency_penalty.title: Frequency Penalty
frequency_penalty.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

presence_penalty.title: Presence Penalty
presence_penalty.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.

stop.title: Stop
stop.description: This field is not handled in the code.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: This field is not handled in the code.

tool_choice.title: Tool Choice
tool_choice.description: This field is not handled in the code.

n.title: N
n.description: This field is not handled in the code.

message.description: Partial content of the response chunk.

finish_reason.description: Explanation of why the response generation was finished.

object.title: Object
object.description: Type of the current schema. Only 'chat.completion' is allowed.

created.title: Created
created.description: Timestamp of when the message was created, in UTC.

model.title: Model
model.description: Alias of the LLM used in the chat session.

choices.title: Choices
choices.description: List of messages in the response.

usage.description: The number of tokens used by the LLM for message generation.

delta.description: Partial content of the response chunk.

finish_reason.description: Explanation of why the response generation was finished.

object.title: Object
object.description: Type of the current schema. Only 'chat.completion.chunk' is allowed.

model.title: Model
model.description: Alias of the LLM used in the chat session.

created.title: Created
created.description: Timestamp of when the message was created, in UTC.

choices.title: Choices
choices.description: List of events related to the streaming message.

prompt_tokens.title: Prompt Tokens
prompt_tokens.description: The number of tokens used in the prompt.

completion_tokens.title: Completion Tokens
completion_tokens.description: The number of tokens used in the response.

total_tokens.title: Total Tokens
total_tokens.description: The total number of tokens used (prompt + response).

webhook_url.title: Webhook Url
webhook_url.description: The URL for receiving a list of documents that are available for the user to access.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: New dictionary of tags that will substitute current

in_use.title: In Use
in_use.description: Allow/disallow knowledge model to use the file in response

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of language model hosting provider

total.title: Total
total.description: Total count of available records. It can be larger than results count.

name.title: Name
examples: Lectures about AI assistants from Constructor University

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description of the knowledge model.
examples: This model allows you to chat about materials science research field.
Set of lectures transcript from AI assistant developing course from Constructor University.
The set of books about Bulgarian history from stone age till now.

shared_type.description:
Sharing type for the knowledge model:
- 'all': Every user may chat with the knowledge model.
- 'tenant': Only users from the owner's tenant can chat with the model.
- 'private': Only the owner can chat with the model.

share_documents.title: Share Documents
share_documents.description: Flag to allow sharing documents with knowledge model depends on shared type

webhook_url.title: Webhook URL for documents access
webhook_url.description: The URL for receiving a list of documents that are available for the user to access.

total.title: Total
total.description: Total count of available records. It can be larger than results count.

name.title: Name
examples: Lectures about AI assistants from Constructor University

description.title: Description
examples: This model allows you to chat about materials science research field.
Set of lectures transcript from AI assistant developing course from Constructor University.
The set of books about bulgarian history from stone age till now.

shared_type.description:
Set knowledge model sharing type,
* 'all' - every user may chat with knowledge model
* 'tenant' - only users from owner tenant can chat with model
* 'private' - only owner can chat with model

share_documents.title: Share Documents
share_documents.description: Flag to allow sharing documents with knowledge model depends on shared type

system_message.description: System messages for defining model personality and behaviour

documents_access.description: Specifies document access settings for the knowledge model

system_message.description: Settings for model personality and responses

documents_access.description: Specifies document access settings for the knowledge model

personality.title: Model personality
personality.description: System message that defines the model's personality and behavior.
examples: You are an assistant for question-answering tasks.
You are an AI assistant specializing in university policies and regulations.
You are an AI assistant for providing guidance within a set of educational courses.
You are an IT support agent who retrieves troubleshooting steps from a repository of known issues and best practices.

responses.title: Model responses
responses.description: System message that defines how model should respond
examples: Be concise! You can give additional note or explanation about the problem and the solution you give if necessary, but keep it short. Be sure to answer the question directly instead of only giving explanatory notes!

Answer questions concisely and professionally, providing specific policy references when applicable. If a question is unclear or outside your scope, ask for clarification or direct the student to the appropriate university department.
When answering questions, provide concise explanations followed by a direct link to the relevant section in the course material.
Responses should be short, around 150 words, with step-by-step instructions on resolving technical problems.

in_use.title: In Use
in_use.description: Whether the video document should be used in the knowledge model

total.description: Total count of available records. It can be larger than results count.

results.title: Results

examples: Bot responded without any document references
